short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension to enable Screen Capture in the Planet eStream WebRecorder.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Planet eStream WebRecorder enables you to record from your Webcam or other attached video/audio devices from within Google Chrome.

The Planet eStream Screen Capture Extension adds the ability to capture the contents of your desktop, or an application's window. 

The Screen Capture Extension also provides Picture-In-Picture recording!

Compatible with Planet eStream 6.35 and above.
